data.title: Best Movies Like Amigo
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Amigo: The Iron Triangle (1989), The Boys in Company C (1978), Company K (2004), The Great War (2019), The Green Berets (1968), Prisoner of the Mountains (1996), Stop-Loss (2008), Saving Private Ryan (1998), Taking Chance (2009), The Hurt Locker (2008)
data.text:
Genre: Drama, War

Country: USA, Philippines

Duration: 124 min.

Story: Rafael, a village mayor caught in the murderous crossfire of the Philippine-American War. When U.S. troops occupy his village, Rafael comes under pressure from a tough-as-nails officer to help the Americans in their hunt for Filipino guerilla fighters. But Rafael's brother is the head of the local guerillas, and considers anyone who cooperates with the Americans to be a traitor. Rafael quickly finds himself forced to make the impossible, potentially deadly decisions faced by ordinary civilians in an occupied country.
